amendment.description: To provide for a study by the National Academy of Sciences.

vote.text: Amendment SA 86 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 11.

action.text: Amendment SA 86 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Amendment SA 86 was modified to reflect a first degree status by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 86 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 67. (consideration: CR S1212-1221, S1223-1226; text: CR S1216) To provide for a study by the National Academy of Sciences.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 86 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 86 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 11.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 86 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 11.
